welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Velletri, a charming city rich in history and known for its beautiful landscapes and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the beauty and culture of our city, and we hope you enjoy your stay here."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ciampino Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leonardo Da Vinci Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at the airport, dedicated to long-haul and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
